md:
giải nghĩa từ "lactase" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Lactase: enzyme /n. (enzyme phân giải lactose)
	+ Meaning: Lactase is an enzyme that breaks down lactose, a sugar found in milk, into easily absorbed sugars.
	+ Example sentence: "Lactase is added to milk to make it suitable for people with lactose intolerance."
	+ Related words: lactose, intolerance, enzyme, milk.

* Lactase: /n. (lactase trong y học)
	+ Meaning: Lactase is a medication that helps people with lactose intolerance to digest lactose.
	+ Example sentence: "The doctor prescribed lactase to help her digest milk products."
	+ Related words: lactose, intolerance, medication, digest.

* Lactase: /n. (lactase trong công nghiệp)
	+ Meaning: Lactase is an industrial enzyme used to break down lactose in milk and dairy products.
	+ Example sentence: "The company uses lactase to produce lactose-free milk for the market."
	+ Related words: lactose, dairy, industry, enzyme.
html:
giải nghĩa từ "lactase" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

  • Lactase: enzyme /n. (enzyme phân giải lactose)

    • Meaning: Lactase is an enzyme that breaks down lactose, a sugar found in milk, into easily absorbed sugars.
    • Example sentence: "Lactase is added to milk to make it suitable for people with lactose intolerance."
    • Related words: lactose, intolerance, enzyme, milk.

  • Lactase: /n. (lactase trong y học)

    • Meaning: Lactase is a medication that helps people with lactose intolerance to digest lactose.
    • Example sentence: "The doctor prescribed lactase to help her digest milk products."
    • Related words: lactose, intolerance, medication, digest.

  • Lactase: /n. (lactase trong công nghiệp)

    • Meaning: Lactase is an industrial enzyme used to break down lactose in milk and dairy products.
    • Example sentence: "The company uses lactase to produce lactose-free milk for the market."
    • Related words: lactose, dairy, industry, enzyme.
